mapper.select: SELECT *, round( 6378.137 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW(SIN((#{latitude} * PI() / 180 - latitude * PI() / 180) / 2), 2) + COS(#{latitude} * PI() / 180) * COS(#{latitude} * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN((#{longitude} * PI() / 180 - longitude * PI() / 180) / 2), 2) ) ) * 1000) as distance FROM product_info where product_id = #{productId} and sale_flag = 'true'
mapper.update: update product_info set total_left = total_left + #{deltaTotalLeft}, update_time = now() where product_id = #{productId}

update.foreach: update product_info set sale_flag = #{saleFlag} where product_id = #{item}
